website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quirks, this is a basic, affordable option that's one of the largest models available.
pros: At 57 inches across, this umbrella will give you ample coverage for hours of hunting in rainy conditions
Hands-free design installs with minimal effort
Folds down easily when you are ready to pack up and head home
cons: Rain falling on the material is noisier than we'd like

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like a sieve
customer_reviews.text: More than a pain in the ass would be easier to use a regular golf umbrella to get covered. Started raining as soon as I set it up and basically just hung it from the back of a chair I was in and it leaks like a sieve. Why buy an umbrella that doesn't really keep the rain off but let's a drip through down the back of your neck, ice cold rain? Returned it immediately. Buy a golf umbrella and paint it camo instead.
customer_reviews.author: DefendTheRepublic

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looses a star as it's just not very durable build quality, and i suspect every couple of years i'll need to replace it. Used 2x this past year and it works as advertised. I sit up on a high bluff, so the wind often comes up the bluff hill - i need to orient the shade with a pretty significant canting to it (screw it into the tree as a significant downward angle) as a result - otherwise the updraft coming up the hill inverts the umbrella. Easy learning. Once that was out of the way it kept me nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great, had one of this brand before, nice. Easy to set up, remove 1 pin can take down and store in bag. i leave it at my stand. Heavy winds and snow can effect it so don't leave it up if in the forecast. Tried another brand before, it was junk.
customer_reviews.author: George Hasto

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and set it up in side to mack where everything is there and that it is not broken I took it out of the what would be a nice storage bag but the bag was not sowen shut so it is open on both ends I did not expect much for the price but would have been nice if they at least hade some form of quality control to mack shere that the customer is getting what they advertise will update when I go to use it but as of right now will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Aaron rothfelder

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for what’s it is. I recommend not placing it under a branchy tree unless frequent watch. Widow makers will destroy, and squirrels store their nuts. But it serves its purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Cedar

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: The screw that goes into the the tree and holds the umbrella only has a round plastic head to grip when you run it in. Mine broke the first time I used it. Amazon quickly sent me another but I am not confident this one will hold up either.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Caughron

customer_reviews.title: Stay dry
customer_reviews.text: Little bit of a pain to put up. But once it’s on you won’t be disappointed! Keep me dry for the entire day
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you dry
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is nice n wide- used it on a rainy day during muzzle loader season- threaded end that goes into the tree could be a bit longe and sharper
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used my umbrella for hunting this year and it worked great. It poured and I was nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time and leaked really bad. Every spot that the thread is attached it leak. At fist it was not bad, after about 10 minutes it was dripping everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the rainy hunts but doesn't really stand up to winds gusting above 15mph. Recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Stay dry
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Every little bit helps to stay dry when hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you dry and can take a little abuse but it takes a couple minutes to set up. The downside is the arm that screws into the tree uses a weak plastic end to hold the umbrella and will strip out if you install it more than about 1/4” into the tree
customer_reviews.author: jonathan tillis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a product I never actually used due to lack of rain
customer_reviews.text: I think it would have served it’s purpose but we didn’t get much rain this season. I installed the mount but never needed the umbrella but for the cost it would have been sufficient
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like it was described in the product description!
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of wind where I live, and the 2nd day I went to my stand it was destroyed by the wind! I'm not sure, but it would be nice if you could refund my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: I’d love to say this was awesome. But seeing how I’m missing everything but the umbrella it’s self I can’t even say anything. Unless I want to open it and hold onto it at the base and lock it in place with my hand the whole time which would be problematic for a bow hunter.
customer_reviews.author: Dayne nordman

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: it could have a bigger bar to hold it out from the tree. but it works great just cant leave it up or lower it down to leave it at the stand
customer_reviews.author: carl whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: No good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella was a huge disappointment. It leaked from every seam and stitch. I even waterproofed it with my typical waterproof spray. Still leaked. Not hard to set up but a waste of time. Will NOT keep you dry. Actually was worse than just sitting in my tree stand with no umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, works
customer_reviews.text: This 14 dollar umbrella has saved more that a few days in a rainy or snowy treestand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap pain to put up get the one from dicks. Leaking the first use
customer_reviews.author: Joshua huffman

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect design, it can be used as a turkey hunting blind also
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have gave 5 stars but it’s to flat water and leaves build up on it
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave them up in the shed hunting because they’ll get torn up in the wind
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but must be taken down in the wind because they’ll just rip apart
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: camo needs to be darker
customer_reviews.text: i like this umbrella the only problem is it"s just to bright the camo needs to be darker
customer_reviews.author: george schupp

customer_reviews.title: Hunting
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband and he loves it!! Just what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: Neshia Hill

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: First time using it right now and it leaks 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easiest to install if you pre drill a hole, but make sure the bit isn't too big. The straps for the umbrella was just barely big enough to go around the tree and tie off. But overall I'm pretty content with it. It kept me dry today.
customer_reviews.author: Thee Kyle Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult or impossible to mount
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to install in any type of hardwood tree. You have to “drill” a hole into the tree while in your stand or the bracket they send will not self start.(not convenient)!!! It looks like it should go right in like any other wood screw... Guess again!
customer_reviews.author: J.H. STEINHOFF

customer_reviews.title: Late delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product was supposed to be delivered Saturday, the day before opening day in MI. I ordered it specifically for opener because we had all day rain in the forecast....I waited most of the day at my house before heading north later than I wanted..it showed up Monday.... I have no clue how it works, it would have been nice to have when expected.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Fabbro

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Recommend! Pros: easy to assemble, protects from the rain Cons: we have a 2 man stand and it covered the stand width wise but I wish it would have been a little wider the rain hit our knees a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof therefore can you call it an umbrella?
customer_reviews.text: Leaks at each seam. There are about 7 or 8 seams. An umbrella that gets you wet is like sun tan lotion that gives you a sun burn. Just another ‘made in China’ product. Would I pay 3 or 4 times more for an umbrella that works and would last a lifetime? Yes. Since there is no such product I have instead applied Duct Tape at every seam.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Bartolini

customer_reviews.title: Could be better!
customer_reviews.text: My product came and I placed where I wanted! Only thing that i noticed is where the straps attach around the tree to the button. Two of them were kinda ripped had to rig them. Other then that it works.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Good as listed
customer_reviews.text: Had one already this was just a replacement as we lost a part
customer_reviews.author: Gail R.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made and can be used overhead or as a small ground blind.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

customer_reviews.title: good for keeping rain of your head in tree stand
customer_reviews.text: have used a similar product works good for intended purpose
customer_reviews.author: rikki b

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for protection from rain when hunting great quality
customer_reviews.author: Tammy housden

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Weak rod to screw into tree. Need to chuck in a drill for deep penetration
customer_reviews.author: Kw

customer_reviews.title: Stayed Dry
customer_reviews.text: Best 20 bucks I ever spent. Stayed dry in steady rain with no rain gear on for Muzzleloader hunt in ladder stand.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The part you screw into the tree broke before I even got to use it as I was screwing it into the tree the tip of that screw broke off cheap POS
customer_reviews.author: Tbuckley

customer_reviews.title: Camp Umbrella perfect cover for light rain.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby says exactly what he thought it was & is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together, and will definitely cover one and a half people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money, don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Throwing your money away buying it. Any breeze at all blows it inside out on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Haydo

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. It was broken when pulled from box.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Only get a handful of seasons out of it
customer_reviews.text: Nice while it lasts. It works well if there is minimal wind. I just strap it to the rail of my climber when theres a chance of rain. Used it maybe a dozen times in the past 5 years. All of the snaps have rusted to the point its unusable. Did buy a 2nd one. For the price it's worth it since I don't use it very often.
customer_reviews.author: George K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. Once you screw it into a tree, you can’t unscrew it! Poor design. I was able to grab my umbrella but my screw in support rod is still stuck in a tree somewhere. Now I have a worthless product. Not sure why the rod isn’t one piece design to unscrew from the tree
customer_reviews.author: pulleye16

product_meta.title: Allen Company Camouflage Hunting Treestand Umbrella, Realtree Edge Camo
feature_bullets: Easy to install - Single person setup
Protects your from the elements like rain & snow
Solid frame will keep it on the tree
Large size to keep you dry
Included Components: Hunting Blinds & Treestands Blinds

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
